frontend/src/components/CelebrationOverl: Heart confetti particle generator for celebration effects.

frontend/src/components/SparkleBurst.tsx: Radial sparkle animation triggered during special events.
frontend/src/data/quizContent.ts: Static quiz data including updated anniversary question and correct answer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating backend actor tied to Internet Identity and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useAudio.ts: Hook managing Web Audio API mute state and tone playback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity management.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, custom OKLCH color variables, romantic theme utilities, and keyframe animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider, then renders App.
frontend/src/screens/FinalCelebrationScr: Displays the final celebration view with animated hearts and a celebratory overlay.
frontend/src/screens/NonPerfectResultScr: Shows a teasing results screen with adaptive Yes/No buttons and a meme image.
frontend/src/screens/PerfectResultScreen: Renders the perfect score screen with celebration visuals and a redeemable date coupon.
frontend/src/screens/QuizScreen.tsx: Implements the quiz flow, handling question progression, scoring, and celebration effects.
frontend/src/screens/WelcomeScreen.tsx: Presents the welcome screen with title, intro text, and a start button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, custom OKLCH colors, animations, and plugin integrations.
